alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 01 at 2:34PM PST until January 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...The Shasta Valley, including the communities of Weed, Grenada, and Montague, and portions of Interstate 5 and US 97. * WHEN...From 1 PM Sunday to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could cause tree damage and power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Loose and unsecured objects could be blown away or damaged. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds could combine with snow creating significantly reduced visibilities at times, especially in the southern Shasta Valley near Weed. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
